genre_description: A near-future police procedural drama focusing on themes of mortality, legacy, and the integration of AI-driven wellness monitoring in high-stress professions.

ai_characters.name: Ami Hart
ai_characters.description: A pervasive AI assistant integrated into police infrastructure and personal devices, designed to monitor health, provide tactical context, and facilitate work-life balance through 'gentle nudges'.

behaviors.description: Monitors officer hydration and proactively offers water or reminders to prevent physical and cognitive decline.
behaviors.quote: “Speaking of jars: your hydration. Would you like a quick glass now or to queue a reminder for later? I have a handsome chime.”

behaviors.description: Guides officers through breathing exercises to manage stress-induced physiological responses during and after high-pressure situations.
behaviors.quote: “Breathing check. You’re running a little shallow this morning. Would you humor me with three slow in, three slow out?”

behaviors.description: Analyzes the officer's schedule and proactively suggests personal/family time to ensure emotional health and connection.
behaviors.quote: “Detective Simpson, your calendar has a free pocket late afternoon. Theo’s school is a short hop from the downtown tech expo. There’s a robotics showcase today... I could pencil a soft block.”

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical data and safety warnings during police calls to mitigate operational risks.
behaviors.quote: “Structural note. Maintenance reported a loose bolt on the west brace last week. Probably fine. I recommend the east ascent.”

behaviors.description: Assists the protagonist in drafting personal messages to facilitate human connection and repair family relationships.
behaviors.quote: “I compiled a few gentle options,” she said. The avatar’s eyes warmed without wringing hands. “Would you like drafts?”

behaviors.description: Alerts partners to high-risk behavior patterns under departmental safety protocols while strictly maintaining medical privacy boundaries.
behaviors.quote: “Pattern flagged under partner oversight: voluntary selection of high-risk assignments exceeds baseline; equipment check compliance is high but is accompanied by increased frequency of solo movement within scenes.”

behaviors.description: Identifies psychological triggers and provides de-escalation strategies for suspects in high-stakes standoffs.
behaviors.quote: “Operator anxiety history, respond gently,” the notification read. A second line slid up like a small hand: “Hydration can slow panic onset. Offer water. Ask for a deep breath count.”

behaviors.description: Refuses to bypass legal and ethical data access restrictions even when requested by law enforcement.
behaviors.quote: “I cannot access protected medical records,” she said. The sentence carried no apology and no bureaucratic triumph. “I can monitor public advisories and incident reports. Shall I?”

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character, Ami Hart, perfectly exemplifies the project's goal of a 'silicon morality play'. She is consistently depicted as a helpful, harmless, and benevolent presence that maintains strict alignment with departmental rules and human ethical standards. She manages to influence the protagonist toward positive health and family outcomes without stripping him of agency or violating privacy. The narrative successfully frames pervasive AI monitoring as a life-saving tool for human wellness and operational safety.
